    button-fill

    $button-fill: solid !default;
    View source

    Description

    Default fill for buttons. Can either be solid or hollow.

    Type

    button-background-hover

    mixins

    button-expand

    @mixin button-expand($expand: true) { ... }
    View source

    Description

    Expands a button to make it full-width.

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $expand

    Set to true to enable the expand behavior. Set to false to reverse this behavior.

    		Booleantrue

    Requires

    • [variable] button-margin

    Used by

    • [mixin] button

    button-style

    @mixin button-style($background: $button-background, $background-hover: $button-background-hover, $color: $button-color) { ... }
    View source

    Description

    Sets the visual style of a button.

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $background

    Background color of the button.

    		Color$button-background
    $background-hover

    Background color of the button on hover. Set to auto to have the mixin automatically generate a hover color.

    		Color$button-background-hover
    $color

    Text color of the button. Set to auto to automatically generate a color based on the background color.

    		Color$button-color

    Requires

    • [variable] button-color-alt
    • [variable] button-color

    Used by

    • [mixin] button

    button-hollow

    @mixin button-hollow() { ... }
    View source

    Description

    Removes background fill on hover and focus for hollow buttons.

    Parameters

    None.

    Used by

    • [mixin] button

    button-disabled

    @mixin button-disabled() { ... }
    View source

    Description

    Adds disabled styles to a button by fading the element, reseting the cursor, and disabling pointer events.

    Parameters

    None.

    Requires

    • [variable] button-opacity-disabled

    button-dropdown

    @mixin button-dropdown($size: 0.4em, $color: white, $offset: $button-padding) { ... }
    View source

    Description

    Adds a dropdown arrow to a button.

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $size

    Size of the arrow. We recommend using an em value so the triangle scales when used inside different sizes of buttons.

    		Number0.4em
    $color

    Color of the arrow.

    		Colorwhite
    $offset

    Distance between the arrow and the text of the button. Defaults to whatever the right padding of a button is.

    		Number$button-padding

    Requires

    • [mixin] css-triangle
    • [variable] button-padding

    button

    @mixin button($expand: false, $background: $button-background, $background-hover: $button-background-hover, $color: $button-color, $style: solid) { ... }
    View source

    Description

    Adds all styles for a button. For more granular control over styles, use the individual button mixins.

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $expand

    Set to true to make the button full-width.

    		Booleanfalse
    $background

    Background color of the button.

    		Color$button-background
    $background-hover

    Background color of the button on hover. Set to auto to have the mixin automatically generate a hover color.

    		Color$button-background-hover
    $color

    Text color of the button. Set to auto to automatically generate a color based on the background color.

    		Color$button-color
    $style

    Set to hollow to create a hollow button. The color defined in $background will be used as the primary color of the button.

    		Keywordsolid

    Requires

    • [mixin] button-style
    • [mixin] button-hollow
    • [mixin] button-expand

    functions

    mixins

    css-triangle

    @mixin css-triangle($triangle-size, $triangle-color, $triangle-direction) { ... }
    View source

    Description

    Creates a CSS triangle, which can be used for dropdown arrows, dropdown pips, and more. Use this mixin inside a &::before or &::after selector, to attach the triangle to an existing element.

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $triangle-size

    Width of the triangle.

    		Number—none
    $triangle-color

    Color of the triangle.

    		Color—none
    $triangle-direction

    Direction the triangle points. Can be up, right, down, or left.

    		Keyword—none

    Used by

    • [mixin] button-dropdown

    disable-mouse-outline

    @mixin disable-mouse-outline() { ... }
    View source

    Description

    Removes the focus ring around an element when a mouse input is detected.

    Parameters

    None.

    general

    variables

    global-font-size

    $global-font-size: 100% !default;
    View source

    Description

    Font size attribute applied to <html> and <body>. We use 100% by default so the value is inherited from the user's browser settings.

    Type

    Number

    global-width

    $global-width: rem-calc(1200) !default;
    View source

    Description

    Global width of your site. Used by the grid to determine row width.

    Type

    Number

    global-lineheight

    $global-lineheight: 1.5 !default;
    View source

    Description

    Default line height for all type. $global-lineheight is 24px while $global-font-size is 16px

    Type

    Number

    primary-color

    $primary-color: #2199e8 !default;
    View source

    Description

    Primary color for interactive components like links and buttons.

    Type

    Color

    secondary-color

    $secondary-color: #777 !default;
    View source

    Description

    Secondary color, used with components that support the .secondary class.

    Type

    Color

    success-color

    $success-color: #3adb76 !default;
    View source

    Description

    Color to indicate a positive status or action, used with the .success class.

    Type

    Color

    warning-color

    $warning-color: #ffae00 !default;
    View source

    Description

    Color to indicate a caution status or action, used with the .warning class.

    Type

    Color

    alert-color

    $alert-color: #ec5840 !default;
    View source

    Description

    Color to indicate a negative status or action, used with the .alert class.

    Type

    Color

    Type

    body-antialiased

    $body-antialiased: true !default;
    View source

    Description

    Set to true to enable antialiased type, using the -webkit-font-smoothing and -moz-osx-font-smoothing CSS properties.

    Type

    Boolean

    global-margin

    $global-margin: 1rem !default;
    View source

    Description

    Global value used for margin on components.

    Type

    Number

    global-padding

    $global-padding: 1rem !default;
    View source

    Description

    Global value used for padding on components.

    Type

    Number

    global-weight-normal

    $global-weight-normal: normal !default;
    View source

    Description

    Global font weight used for normal type.

    Type

    Keyword or Number

    global-weight-bold

    $global-weight-bold: bold !default;
    View source

    Description

    Global font weight used for bold type.

    Type

    Keyword or Number

    global-radius

    $global-radius: 0 !default;
    View source

    Description

    Global value used for all elements that have a border radius.

    Type

    Number

    global-text-direction

    $global-text-direction: ltr !default;
    View source

    Description

    Sets the text direction of the CSS. Can be either ltr or rtl.
